price: 31. Neither shady, nor of any use against the fierce flame of the Fire."
arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: lā ẓalīlin walā yugh'nī mina al-lahabi
